class RIANN[source]

RIANN(onnx_path=None)

Real-time progress plots for Jupyter notebooks.

Parameters

onnx_path : str, optional, default: None Path to the RIANN onnx file. Defaults to the file provided with the package.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
sequence_length=100
acc = np.ones((sequence_length,3))
gyr = np.ones_like(acc)
fs = 200
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
riann = RIANN()
riann.predict(acc,gyr,fs).shape

(100, 4)
